servinfo.title: Rear Wheel Hub Assembly, Wheel Bearing and Wheel Stud Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Rear Wheel Hub Assembly Removal and Installation (Rear Drum Brake Model)
Rear Wheel Hub Assembly Removal and Installation (Rear Disc Brake Model)

item.ptxt: Wheel bearing and wheel hub form a solid unit.
When wheel bearing is found defective and its replacement is necessary, replace hub assembly.
